attributes.action: More education in life skills in schools to set young people for the future
attributes.additional_details: Students are leaving school and they're uncertain of what to do with their lives therefore young people should shown the options of what to do in the future.
attributes.background: Students leave school not knowing what to do or where to go. If schools give young people and idea of what options they have whether its further education, working  and what they can do with their lives to secure their future.
